content:
I think there's another misunderstanding! As a conversational AI, I don't have any information about Mark's cousin working at Travelocity or any discounts you may be eligible for.

However, if you do have a connection with someone who works in the travel industry, it's definitely worth reaching out to them for advice or potential discounts!

If you do decide to follow up with Mark's cousin, you might want to ask them about:

* Any available discounts or promotions on Caribbean cruises in February
* Recommendations for cruise lines or itineraries that might fit your preferences and budget
* Tips on how to get the best value for your money
* Any insider knowledge on upcoming sales or special deals

Just remember to be respectful of their time and expertise, and don't hesitate to ask questions or seek their advice. Good luck, and I hope you find a great deal on your Caribbean cruise!
